com.jidesoft.converter
Class HexColorConverter

java.lang.Object
  com.jidesoft.converter.ColorConverter
      com.jidesoft.converter.HexColorConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObjectConverter 
public class HexColorConverter
extends ColorConverter

Converts Color to/from #xxxxxx format. For example #000000 is Color(0, 0, 0) and #FF00FF is Color(255, 0, 255).
